title: José José: El Príncipe de la Canción
overview: Music and alcoholism are the two constants in the brilliant career of José José, The Prince of the Song. Gifted with a talented voice, he soon becomes the most important interpreter of romantic music. But the price of worldwide fame is very high, and he pays until he falls into a pitfall of his own demons. José José the man learns to get up - without family, without friends, without love - while the artist, about to lose his career, knows that music will help him face his worst demon: the drink.
